cast.overview: Welcome to Hotel Transylvania, Dracula's lavish five-stake resort, where monsters and their families can live it up and no humans are allowed. One special weekend, Dracula has invited all his best friends to celebrate his beloved daughter Mavis's 118th birthday. For Dracula catering to all of these legendary monsters is no problem but the party really starts when one ordinary guy stumbles into the hotel and changes everything!
cast.title: Hotel Transylvania

details.biography:
From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia.  Maddie Taylor (born Matthew William Taylor; December 31, 1966) is an American film and television voice actress, story artist, and comedienne, best known as the voice of Buddy, Deni, and additional voices in the Open Season franchise, Verminous Snaptrap in T.U.F.F. Puppy, and Sparky in The Fairly OddParents.

Description above from the Wikipedia article Maddie Taylor, licensed under CC-BY-SA, full list of contributors on Wikipedia.
details.name: Maddie Taylor
